Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45310 affecting package moby-runc for versions less than 1.1.9-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45310 affecting package moby-runc for versions less than 1.1.9-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-runc is earlier than 1.1.9-8, affected by CVE-2024-45310
